title: Drawing, Design for Side Serving Table with Two Drawers and Lower Shelf, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Side Serving Table with Two Drawers and Lower Shelf
medium: Graphite on thin cream writing paper
inscribed: In graphite, lower right quadrant: "50:; in graphite, at upper right corner: "2" (in a circle); In graphite above upper center of design: "4'-0" "
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular surface and two-drawer unit at top with back splash resting on four straight tapering legs.  This serving unit has one lower shelf.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Side Serving Table with Two Drawers and Lower Shelf, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream writing paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-91
